column5: I found this on the web and it was a total flashback to being kid and hearing these commercials. Anybody remember these?  http://www.hww.ca/media.asp?mcid=1
i remember.  i even think i saw one on tv not too long ago.
yeah they are back on tv
Not only do I remember seeing them (and hearing that opening song) on regular TV but I remember the spoofs of them on SCTV.
